Articles.Content: Hey guys, I was messing around in photoshop with a screenshot of Duna and after finishing I realized it looked pretty decent; So I stuck a KSP logo on it and called it a desktop background! Feel free to use it wherever you want and if you do end up using it, make sure you tell me where and what you think of it
In my humble opinion, I think that the Duna title should be more discreet, its nice though

In my humble opinion, I think that the Duna title should be more discreet, its nice though

Yeah, I couldn't decide what to do with that. If I made it too transparent then it wouldn't show up with the right colour :/
